concentrationSummary.concentrationSummary: Digital commerce reveals how the marketing process comes to life. Students will use technical skills with creativity to understand how brands reach target audiences across digital platforms. From financial accounting to business information systems digital commerce will provide necessary requirements needed in the job market.

employmentOutlook.employmentOutlook: The demand for digital marketing professionals is 44%.

jobOpportunities.jobOpportunities: Students who complete this concentration typically find entry-level positions right away.

medianSalary.medianSalary: The median salary of a digital marketing specialist is $49,773.

description.description: Sell advertising opportunities to businesses, organizations and individual clients online.
Implement effective search engine optimization, coordinate pay per click actions, and report on performance.
Manage traffic of sales and strategies that help improve performance of a website.
organize, keep track, and report on digital advertising campaigns for clients.
